availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, physician. Virginia native. Married to Sarah E. Powell. Father of Catherine Powell, Ellen D. Powell, Fannie Powell, Elizabeth Powell, William W. Powell, and Maria W. Powell. Owned eight enslaved persons in Louisville in 1850. Physician in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 3, p. 843.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 5, p. 130.
